entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 70%
